All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CalculateUseCase
The CalculateUseCase class implements the OperationCalculatorPort interface to handle the calculation of the maximum non-negative integer k, based on the constraints provided in the OperationDomain.
CustomException
 
DataBaseException
Custom exception class for handling database-related errors.
DataSourceH2Config
Configuration properties class for H2 DataSource.
ErrorResponse
Model class for standardizing error response format in API responses.
GenericException
Abstract base class for custom exceptions in the application.
GenericResponse
Generic response wrapper for REST API responses.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for the application.
H2Config
Configuration class for setting up the H2 database DataSource.
LoadAppException
Custom exception class for handling application loading errors.
MaxIntegerSolverApplication
 
MockFactory
The MockFactory class is a utility class for creating mock objects for testing.
OperationCalculatorPort
The OperationCalculatorPort interface defines the inbound port for calculating operations within the application core.
OperationDomain
The OperationDomain class represents the domain model for an operation.
OperationEntity
Entity class representing an operation record in the database.
OperationH2Adapter
Adapter class for handling operation-related database interactions.
OperationH2Repository
Spring Data JPA repository for OperationEntity instances.
OperationRequest
Data transfer object for operation requests.
OperationResponse
Custom response wrapper specifically for operation-related responses.
OperationResultsPort
The OperationResultsPort interface specifies the inbound port for retrieving the results of operations.
OperationsController
The OperationsController class handles incoming REST API requests related to operations.
OperationService
The OperationService class, part of the domain service layer, encapsulates the business logic for calculating the maximum non-negative integer k, such that 0 ≤ k ≤ n and k mod x = y.
OperationStorageRepository
The OperationStorageRepository interface defines the outbound port for persisting operation results.
RestConfig
Configuration class for REST API settings.
ResultsUseCase
The ResultsUseCase class implements the OperationResultsPort interface to handle the use case of retrieving results of all performed operations.
ServicesConfig
Configuration class for Services in the application.
SPError
Enumerates standard error codes and messages for consistent error handling across the application.
SpringDocConfig
Configuration class for SpringDoc.
UsesCasesConfig
Configuration class for Use Cases in the application.
ValidationMessages
The ValidationMessages class provides a centralized repository of constant messages used for validation throughout the application.
